title: Raines Bribos told White House employees to address Ivanka Trump and Jared Kouchner as "secretary"?
subtitle: An alleged e-mail for White House employees was posted on an anonymous account on Twitter.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The White House Chief of Staff, Raines Bribos, sent an e-mail to the White House staff ordering them to address Ivanka Trump and Jared Kouchner with a secretary.
